channel.title: Posts on Hoang's Pipeline
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hoang's Pipeline

item.title: My Return to Tiki: A New Chapter
item.description: Introduction In early 2022, I made the exciting decision to return to Tiki, a company close to my heart. The driving force behind this decision was the exceptional team and the company’s inspiring mission. What I’ve Been Up To Upon my return to Tiki, I embarked on several remarkable projects, making a significant impact: Project: Sandseel - The Exchange Market Platform Leveraging the open-source Peatio framework Peatio, I worked on developing this platform.

item.title: Exploring the World of Incognito Chain
item.description: Introduction Joining the dynamic world of Incognito, a blockchain platform, opened up exciting opportunities to delve into the realm of blockchain and privacy-enhancing technologies. Website: https://incognito.org My Role and Contributions During my time with Incognito, I was involved in several significant projects: Project: Incognito Chain - Platform for Privacy Blockchain Made modest contributions to core Incognito Chain features Project: Blockchain Backend - Microservices for Incognito Wallet Transformed the architecture from monolithic to microservices, enhancing scalability and modularity.

item.title: Embarking on a Professional Journey at Tiki
item.description: Introduction Joining the dynamic world of Tiki, a thriving marketplace for eCommerce brands and sellers, marked a significant step in my professional journey. Website: https://www.tiki.vn My Role and Contributions During my tenure at Tiki, I had the opportunity to work on various projects. Here are some of the key projects I was involved in: Project: Talaria - Platform for Order, Inventory, Shipping, Fulfillment, Checkout Built comprehensive function tests for Talaria, ensuring its reliability.

item.title: My New Job at Zinio
item.description: Introduction At Zinio, a digital eMagazines company, I found myself in a dynamic and diverse work environment. Website: https://www.zinio.com What I Did One of the key projects I worked on during my time at Zinio was: Project: Zenit - Digital Magazine Management Platform I played a significant role in building the API for this platform, leveraging PHP and Symfony. Technology used: Symfony I conducted research on search engines and implemented ElasticSearch to enhance content discovery.

item.title: My New Job at CCIntegration
item.description: Introduction At CCIntegration, a product company, I embarked on a new phase of my career. Website: https://www.ccintegration.com What I Did During my time at CCIntegration, my main responsibilities included: Frontend Development with AngularJS: I worked on building the frontend of web applications using AngularJS, a popular JavaScript framework. Technology used: AngularJS Message Queues with RabbitMQ: I gained experience in building and managing basic message queues using RabbitMQ, a robust messaging platform.

item.title: My Second Job at Moxs
item.description: Introduction At Moxs, an eCommerce company, I continued to expand my experience in the field. What I Did During my time at Moxs, my primary project was: Shopware Open Source Website (PHP): I was involved in the development of a website using the open-source platform Shopware. This project was built using PHP. Repository: Shopware My work at Moxs allowed me to delve further into eCommerce and open-source technologies, contributing to my growth in the field.

item.title: Starting My First Job at Esc.vn
item.description: Introduction At Esc Company, I joined a small but dedicated team with the exciting task of developing a website for our client. Website: https://www.esc.vn What I did During my time at Esc.vn, I worked on the following projects: ASP.NET MVC Website: Developed a website using ASP.NET MVC, jQuery, and Ajax. Utilized SQL Server for database management. Technologies used: jQuery TomatoCart Open Source Website (PHP): Created a website using the open-source platform TomatoCart.

item.title: Encouraging College Students to Acquire Computer Knowledge
item.description: Introduction Encouraging college students to embark on a journey of computer knowledge, starting from the fundamentals and expanding their horizons. Fundamental Skills Elementary Algorithms and Data Structures Building a foundation in algorithms and data structures. Creating a Monolithic Ecommerce Website Understanding the fundamentals of web development by building a monolithic e-commerce website. Frontend Development HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Exploring the basics of web development through HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Backend Development PHP, MySQL, C, C#, Java
